a substance made from glass that is used to decorate or protect clay, metal, and glass objects, or an object covered with this substance: [ U ] The enamel on the sink was chipped.
Enamel is also a type of paint that forms a shiny surface when dry: [ C ] I used a blue enamel for the trim.
Enamel is also the hard, white, shiny substance that forms the covering of a tooth.
